extension.news:
v0.6.1 (2023-05-30) - Performance improvements on Linux ARM - This will be the last release for Python 2 i.e. Kodi 18 (Leia) and below. The next release will require Python 3 and Kodi 19 (Matrix) or higher.
v0.6.0 (2023-05-03) - Initial support for AARCH64 Linux - Initial support for AARCH64 Macs - New option to install a specific version on most platforms
v0.5.10 (2022-04-18) - Fix automatic submission of release - Update German translation - Fix update_frequency setting - Fix install_from - Improve/Fix Widevine extraction from Chrome OS images
v0.5.9 (2022-03-22) - Update Croatian translation - Replace deprecated LooseVersion - Fix http_get decode error - Option to install Widevine from specified source
